Player History
Signed as a free agent by Florida on 3/1/1999 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,001 per year...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 1999...
Signed as a free agent by Florida on 2/27/2000 to a 1-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/26/2001 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2001 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2001...
Traded from Colorado to Boston on 7/31/2003 (Going to BOS: P M. Valdes, SS R. Clayton, C C. Snyder. Going to COL: P U. Urbina, 3B T. Naehring)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/1/2004 to a 2-year deal worth $950,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 3/1/2006 to a 1-year deal worth $486,000 per year...
Injured on 4/10/2006 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/26/2007 to a 1-year deal worth $425,000 per year...
Drafted in 8th round, 204th overall pick, by San Diego in 2008...
Injured on 4/5/2008 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/2008 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 9-10 weeks...
Injured on 5/20/2009 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Traded from San Diego to Seattle on 2/26/2010 (Going to SDN: C D. Ross. Going to SEA: P B. Hendren, SS D. Gordon, 1B V. Wilson)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2012, off Dan Otero (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2012, off Clay Buchholz (TEX)...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/2013, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2013...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2015, hitting .314 with 8 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/1/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $565,000 per year...
Drafted in 5th round, 117th overall pick, by Milwaukee in 2020...
Injured on 6/9/2020 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Drafted in 6th round, 118th overall pick, by Houston in 1977...
Released by Houston on 3/2/1978...
